languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately returns to the cell where they started their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the Bladedancer used {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} this turn, this movement repeats all uses of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} in reverse.

traits.locale_text: The Bladedancer immediately returns to the cell where they started their turn. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. If the Bladedancer used {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} this turn, this movement repeats all uses of this ability in reverse.

The Bladedancer immediately returns to the cell where they started their turn. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. If the Bladedancer made jumps using Death From Above this turn, this movement repeats those jumps in reverse.

The Bladedancer immediately returns to the cell where they started their turn. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. If the Bladedancer made jumps using Death From Above this turn, this movement repeats those jumps in reverse.

The Bladedancer immediately returns to the cell where they started their turn. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. If the Bladedancer used Death From Above this turn, this movement repeats all uses of this ability in reverse.

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} vuelve de inmediato a la casilla en la que empezó su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Si el hoja danzante ha usado {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g} este turno, el movimiento repite todos los usos de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} en orden inverso.

This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the Bladedancer used {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} this turn, this movement repeats all uses of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} in reverse.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} vuelve de inmediato a la casilla en la que empezó su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Si el hoja danzante ha usado {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g} este turno, el movimiento repite todos los usos de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} en orden inverso.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時にいたセルに戻る。この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。ブレードダンサーがこのターンで{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}を使用していた場合、この移動は、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のすべての使用を逆順で繰り返す。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately returns to the cell where they started their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the Bladedancer used {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} this turn, this movement repeats all uses of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} in reverse.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時にいたセルに戻る。この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。ブレードダンサーがこのターンで{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}を使用していた場合、この移動は、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のすべての使用を逆順で繰り返す。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}立刻返回本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时所在的格子，此动作不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。如果刀锋舞者在本回合内使用过{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}，则此动作会按照时间先后顺序，逆序触发本回合内发动过的所有死从天降{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately returns to the cell where they started their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the Bladedancer used {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} this turn, this movement repeats all uses of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} in reverse.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}立刻返回本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时所在的格子，此动作不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。如果刀锋舞者在本回合内使用过{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}，则此动作会按照时间先后顺序，逆序触发本回合内发动过的所有死从天降{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} retourne immédiatement sur la case où il avait commencé son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Si le danselame a utilisé {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g} au cours de ce tour, il répète tous les déplacements de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} en sens inverse.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately returns to the cell where they started their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the Bladedancer used {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} this turn, this movement repeats all uses of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} in reverse.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} retourne immédiatement sur la case où il avait commencé son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Si le danselame a utilisé {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g} au cours de ce tour, il répète tous les déplacements de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} en sens inverse.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} kehrt sofort zu der Zelle zurück, auf der er seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} begonnen hat. Diese Bewegung provoziert keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}. Hat der Klingentänzer bei diesem Zug {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} eingesetzt, wiederholt diese Bewegung alle Einsätze dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} in umgekehrter Reihenfolge.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} immediately returns to the cell where they started their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. If the Bladedancer used {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} this turn, this movement repeats all uses of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} in reverse.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} kehrt sofort zu der Zelle zurück, auf der er seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} begonnen hat. Diese Bewegung provoziert keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}. Hat der Klingentänzer bei diesem Zug {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} eingesetzt, wiederholt diese Bewegung alle Einsätze dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} in umgekehrter Reihenfolge.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} немедленно возвращается на клетку, где он начинал свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Если танцор смерти в этом ходу использовал {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Смерть свыше{/g}, при движении с помощью этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} он повторит все перемещения в обратном порядке.

Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} немедленно возвращается на клетку, где он начинал свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, anında {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} başladığı hücreye geri döner. Bu hareket, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Kılıç Dansçısı o turda {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g} kabiliyetini kullandıysa bu hareket, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetin{/g} tüm kullanımlarını tersten tekrarlar.
